mapper.update: UPDATE c_work_calendar SET day=#{day,jdbcType=DATE}, isWorkDay=#{isWorkDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system=#{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from c_work_calendar where day >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system = #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND isWorkDay = "1" UNION SELECT * from c_work_calendar WHERE day >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND day NOT IN (select day from c_work_calendar where day >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system = #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND system = "public" AND isWorkDay = "1" ORDER BY day limit #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER},1;
